bug.author: sharvil
bug.description:
Looks like the documentation for tf.estimator.EstimatorSpec got lost along the way from 1.13 to 1.14. Can we please add it back in? <denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.14/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/EstimatorSpec</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.15/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/EstimatorSpec>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.15/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/EstimatorSpec</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing): Reinstate documentation (see https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.13/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/EstimatorSpec)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request? no</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: We're not going to go back and fix the 1.14 and older docs. But this is fixed in 1.15+. The fix will be published early next week.

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=32528>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=32528>No</denchmark-link>
